page.title: 16PEASLAKE GARAGE
page.content: There has not always been a garage here. It used to be a cycle repair workshop. The Hutchins family has been at the garage for fifty years. It is open from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m. Mr. Hutchins employs four mechanics and one secretary. They repair about 40 cars a week. They do paint spraying and M.O.T. tests. They sell new and secondhand cars. l6,000 litres of Pace petrol are delivered each week and stored in a tank underground. There are two petrol pumps. The garage has one breakdown truck and it is R.A.C. approved. Birmingham is the furthest they have had to go to collect a car which had broken down.
